briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Bimagrumab/BYM338 at 52 Weeks on Physical Function, Muscle Strength, Mobility in sIBM Patients
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Multicenter, Parallel Group, Dose-finding, Pivotal, Phase 2b/3 Study to Evaluate the Efficacy, Safety, and Tolerability of Intravenous BYM338 at 52 Weeks on Physical Function, Muscle Strength, and Mobility and Additional Long Term Safety up to 2 Years in Patients With Sporadic Inclusion Body Myositis
summary: This study evaluated the efficacy, safety and tolerability of multiple doses of bimagrumab/BYM338 vs placebo, when administered intravenously (i.v.), on physical function, muscle strength, and mobility in patients with sporadic inclusion body myositis (sIBM).

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in 6 Minute Walking Distance (6MWD) Test at Week 52
